title: i have a black screen with my new client
body: after every champ select when i m goin to go in game the game stops working and my pc crashes ( I cant do anything except moving the mouse and somtimes i have black screen ) btw that didnt happen with the legacy client but now it happens to me everytime

replies.body: Getting the same issue, has been happening about the last 2 months on and off it is just now getting really bad, made a new smurf account lost 2 placement games due to this same thing and now my first game after placements getting leave buster for all of them and loss of lp, honestly weird how a multi billion dollar company can't make a working client before retiring the old one, never had this problem before. Really frustrated with losing ranked games over this, only fix i found was pressing esc at the black screen then waiting 2 minutes to reconnect, it was a gamble tho if it wild reconnect in time for my team to not remake also always puts me behind atleast 2 waves before even starting, I have effected many people because of this. It is not a internet issue I have the best internet I can possibly have getting 40 or lower me and 80+ mbps, it is 100% a client issue. My computer is not the best so I'm sure that has something to do with it but if rather not spend 800$ when I'm in college to play a video game. Really hope the issue gets resolved and also out many tickets in on a different account about this and get the same reply everytime, "it's a connection issue". It's not it's client issue
Just happened 4 games in a row and this time no recconect button the client takes to long to load so they game is remade before I can get back in

This black screen usually suggests a connection problem that's failing to download assets, so it stays black.  When you say crash, are there any messages coming up?  In the meantime, you should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Even if your internet seems okay, you can get issues reaching specific places.  Let me know if you have any questions!
